item.title: About
item.description: I’m Marco Sanchez, a Mexican Computer Engineering Student and Penetration Tester who likes to learn and explore new things related to computers and electronics. Also, I love to share my knowledge and experiences with the world, which is the reason for this blog :D Speaking and Workshops Link to heading HackGDL 2024 - Lockpicking Workshop Link to heading I participated in a lockpicking workshop with Pwntacles during the first edition of HackGDL in Guadalajara, Mexico.
